summary: WishMint AI website: fix sidebar navigation so menu items smoothly scroll to in-page sections (with header offset) instead of redirecting to Home.
architectural_notes: Use in-page section IDs (home, create-wish, templates, marketplace, pricing, dashboard, faq) and scroll-to-section behavior instead of router navigation/href='/' or href='#'.
Apply smooth scrolling and account for sticky header via scroll margin/offset so target sections are not hidden.
known_issues: Sidebar menu item clicks redirect/reload to Home instead of scrolling to the selected section.

existing_features.title: Ensure the landing page contains a single set of in-page sections with the exact IDs used by sidebar navigation: home, create-wish, templates, marketplace, pricing, dashboard, faq.

Update the sidebar/mobile navigation click handling so clicking any menu item performs in-page smooth scrolling to the target section and does not trigger route navigation, full page reload, or redirect to Home.
Implement/standardize smooth scrolling for sidebar navigation using the existing smoothScrollToAnchor utility and ensure it is the single mechanism used by sidebar navigation for section scrolling.

Fix sticky-header offset so scrolled-to sections are not hidden behind the sticky header by applying a consistent safe scroll margin to all main sections and ensuring the scroll utility offsets by the sticky header height.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix sidebar navigation to close menu and smoothly scroll to correct in-page sections (no reload/redirect), with correct section IDs and sticky-header offset.
